tweet: Did you know that between 2000 - 2018, small businesses were responsible for 65% of the new job creation in America? This #SmallBusinessSaturday, I urge you to support small businesses, which are the cornerstone of our economy, and shop local. pic.twitter.com/xg85VJhmlu

Happy Thanksgiving, from my family to yours. Thanksgiving is a time to reflect on all that we are grateful for. I am thankful for my family, my state, and my country. And I am especially thankful to serve and represent all who live in Georgia's Thirteenth Congressional District. pic.twitter.com/XnkPrflp4f

Together with my Georgia colleagues @repjohnlewis, @SanfordBishop, @RepHankJohnson and @RepLucyMcBath, I sent a letter today to the Georgia Secretary of State condemning the state's plans to purge 330,000 voter registrations. pic.twitter.com/p8Tk2p8ynk

This week I joined my colleagues in the House to pass #HR2423, the Women’s Suffrage Centennial Commemorative Coin Act. This bipartisan bill commemorates the ratification of the 19th Amendment & honors the legacy of patriots who blazed the trail to lead women to the voting booth. pic.twitter.com/p5k1lETK6x
